contentrichtext.text: {{icelandic name|Hrafn}} {{Infobox person | name = Hrafn Gunnlaugsson | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1948|6|17}} | birth_place = [[Reykjavík]], [[Iceland]] | occupation = Director, screenwriter | years_active = 1974–present }} '''Hrafn Gunnlaugsson''' (born June 17, 1948) is an Icelandic film director. He is the brother of the actress [[Tinna Gunnlaugsdóttir]]. He is mostly known for his series of [[Viking]] movies, sometimes called "Cod Westerns". He married Edda Kristjánsdóttir<ref>[http://www.dialektika.dk/genealogy/getperson.php?personID=I2675&tree=01 Brahde Family Tree]</ref> and they have four children: Kristján who is a poet and playwright, Tinna who is an actress, Sól<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0348321/bio Biography for Hrafn Gunnlaugsson]</ref> and Örk who was born in 1993.<ref>[http://www.simnet.is/hrafng/News/ShadowOfTheRaven-Article.html Shadow of the Raven]</ref> ==Filmography== * ''[[Óðal feðranna]]'' (1981) * ''[[Hrafninn flýgur]]'' (''When the Raven Flies'') (1984) * ''[[Í skugga hrafnsins]]'' (''In the Shadow of the Raven'') (1988) * ''[[White Viking|Hvíti víkingurinn]]'' (''The White Viking'') (1991) * ''[[Helgu vé, Hin]]'' (''The Sacred Mound'') (1993) * ''[[Myrkrahöfðinginn]]'' (2000) * ''[[Reykjavík í öðru ljósi]]'' (2000) * ''[[Opinberun Hannesar]]'' (2004) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb name|id=0348321|name=Hrafn Gunnlaugsson}} * [http://www.vikingfilms.net/ Hrafn Gunnlaugsson's Production Company] (accessed 26/11/06) {{Authority control|VIAF=120981973}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Gunnlaugsson, Hrafn | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = June 17, 1948 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Gunnlaugsson, Hrafn}} [[Category:1948 births]] [[Category:Icelandic anarchists]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Reykjavík|Hrafn Gunnlaugsson]] [[Category:Icelandic film directors|Hrafn Gunnlaugsson]] [[Category:20th-century Icelandic people]] [[Category:Best Director Guldbagge Award winners]] {{film-bio-stub}}
